content: Jeremiah Called to Be a Priest
The words of Jeremiah the son of Hilkiah, of the priests who  in Anathoth in the land of Benjamin,
to whom the word of the  came in the days of Josiah the son of Amon, king of Judah, in the thirteenth year of his reign.

It came also in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, until the end of the eleventh year of Zedekiah the son of Josiah, king of Judah, until the carrying away of Jerusalem captive in the fifth month.
Then the word of the  came to me, saying:
Then the  put forth His hand and touched my mouth, and the  said to me:
Moreover the word of the  came to me, saying, “Jeremiah, what do you see?”And I said, “I see a branch of an almond tree.”
Then the  said to me, “You have seen well, for I am ready to perform My word.”
And the word of the  came to me the second time, saying, “What do you see?”And I said, “I see a boiling pot, and it is facing away from the north.”
